title: How to Make Chocolate Eclair Pie

steps.headline: Follow the instructions on the pudding box.
steps.description: Combine the pudding mix and milk in a large bowl. Place the bowl in the refrigerator for about an hour, to allow the mixture to set and harden.

steps.headline: Fold in the whipping topping and mix thoroughly.
Place a layer of graham crackers on the bottom of a 9" x 13" (23 x 33 cm) inch pan.
Spread about half of the pudding mixture over the graham crackers.
Repeat the layering until you have three layers of graham crackers.
Spread the chocolate icing over the graham crackers.
Chill 10 hours or overnight to allow the pudding to set fully and for the graham crackers to soften.

text: Follow the instructions on the pudding box. Combine the pudding mix and milk in a large bowl. Place the bowl in the refrigerator for about an hour, to allow the mixture to set and harden. Fold in the whipping topping and mix thoroughly.  Place a layer of graham crackers on the bottom of a 9" x 13" (23 x 33 cm) inch pan.  Spread about half of the pudding mixture over the graham crackers.  Repeat the layering until you have three layers of graham crackers.  Spread the chocolate icing over the graham crackers.  Chill 10 hours or overnight to allow the pudding to set fully and for the graham crackers to soften.
